column1: Annual Government  Revenues And Expenditures by Sector -Actual
(1) Unit :Million Currency :Riyals Source: Ministry of Finance.

(2) Unit :Million Currency :Riyals Budget allocation for fiscal year 1411/12 ( 1991 ) was amalgamated with the budget for 1410/11( 1990 ).
In 2000, 2002, 2004 Salaries of 13 months were paid.
in 2010 The Surplus does not include expenditure on projects from surplus account (Rls17057 Million). And it includes deposits (Rls 731 Million) in government current account.
Note : As from 1407/08 ( 1987 ), the kingdom's fiscal year begins on 10th capricorn of the Zodiac year. Up to 1405/06 ( 1985 ) the fiscal years covered the period from 1st Rajab to the end of Jumad II.
Source: Ministry of Finance.
